name: Treasures of the Land
description:
You are a stowaway on a ship. During your journey you encounter a storm and are thrown off the ship. You drift onto a mysterious island where a new life awaits for you.

Learn how to farm, fight, collect resources and take care of livestock in the Role-Playing Simulator game.

Treasures of the Land is a student project developed by a team of 9.

The game is currently in the beta stage.
